name: Roman Legionary
description:
Take on the role of a soldier in the Roman army and fight in brutal battles in which you will fight with barbarians and hostile Romans. Strive to become the commander of the Roman legion. Become a legend of the Roman army.
Some missions rely on open combat, while in others You have to be smart to sneak up and assasinate a target.
After the fight, relax in the tavern with beer and beautiful women, spending gold captured on Rome's enemies.

Features:
  • Small and massive battles
  • Melee and ranged combat
  • First person slasher
  • System of gaining experience
  • Realistic and dynamic battles
  • Realistic graphics
